title: Veterinary Case-Based Collaborative Learning: Integrated Team-Based Learning (TBL) and Case-Based Learning (CBL) Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational veterinary science knowledge (anatomy, physiology, pathology) and basic clinical case analysis skills
context.additional_context: A Course Combining Team-Based Learning (TBL) and Case-Based Learning (CBL) to Analyze Real Veterinary Clinical Cases and Strengthen Collaborative Problem-Solving Skills

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key symptoms and test results in given veterinary clinical cases to derive at least three potential diagnoses.
Learners can collaborate with team members to develop treatment plans for clinical cases and justify decisions using evidence-based approaches.
Learners can actively listen to peersâ€™ opinions during team discussions, provide constructive feedback, and lead consensus-building.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
